titleStmt.author: Sylvester, Josuah

analytic.title: TO The most Royal Lady ELIZABETH, Infanta of England; Princess PALATINE of Rhine.
analytic.author: Sylvester, Josuah

monogr.title: All the small vvorkes of that famous poet Iosuah Siluester : Gathered into one volume
monogr.author: Sylvester, Josuah

div.head: TO The most Royal Lady ELIZABETH, Infanta of England; Princess PALATINE of Rhine.
div.l: SWeet Grace of GRACES, Glory of Your Age,
Your Princely State, Your Royall Parentage;
Heer, to your HIGHNES (with all Good-Presage,
I consecrate This LITTLE-One of Mine
To serue Your Self, first; then, Your Son, for Page.
Your gracious Favours to my former Brood,
So binde my Thoughts, so bolden my Desires,
To showe Mee gratefull, as I know You good;
That Thus to YOV, This LITTLE Mine aspires:
Little in Growth; yet of so great a Spirit,
As (happily) Your Graces grace may merit.

closer.signed: To Your Highnes Seruice, Dulie and Trulie devoted, Iosuah Sylvester.
